106b7(mdo sde): ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'di ltar rab
106b8(mdo sde): tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lha'i gnas rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba'i rigs rjes su dran pa dang / longs spyod rjes su dran pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa rjes su dran pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa rjes su dran pa dang /
107a1(mdo sde): mtsho dang 'brel pa rjes su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas kyi khams shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs
107a2(mdo sde): pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang rigs la gnas pa'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa'i rgyu dang mi mdza' ba dang
107a3(mdo sde): phrad pa'i rgyu dang / chu dang 'brel ba'i rgyu ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs
107a4(mdo sde): pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / rigs la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mdza' bshes la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral
107a5(mdo sde): ba dang / mi mdza' ba la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mtsho la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar
107a6(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na thabs la mkhas pa ji snyed pa nyid
107a7(mdo sde): ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i
107a8(mdo sde): mtha' shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na skye ba'i rigs la 'jug pa dang / skye ba'i yul du 'jug pa dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad par 'jug pa dang /
107b1(mdo sde): mi mdza' ba dang phrad par 'jug pa dang / mtsho yongs su shes par 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de
107b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul du gnas par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / skye ba'i rigs la 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang /
107b3(mdo sde): mdza' bshes dang phrad par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / mtsho yongs su shes par 'jug pa'i rgyu shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha'
107b4(mdo sde): shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
107b5(mdo sde): bu'i rmi lam na 'jug pa'i rgyu dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs
107b6(mdo sde): pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin shes pa dang / skye ba'i rigs yang dag par grub pa shes pa
107b7(mdo sde): dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa yang dag par grub pa shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang bral ba yang dag par grub pa shes pa dang / mtsho yongs su shes pa yang dag par grub pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
107b8(mdo sde): pas phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu
108a1(mdo sde): ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na 'chi ba shes pa dang / mdza' bshes dang bral ba shes pa dang / mi mdza' ba dang bral ba shes pa dang / mtsho dang bral ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes
108a2(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'chi ba shes pa bsags pa'i
108a3(mdo sde): rgyu dang / yul na gnas pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / yul ngan par gnas pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa bsags pa'i rgyu dang / mtsho yongs su shes pa bsags pa'i rgyu ji snyed
108a4(mdo sde): pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu
108a5(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mdza' bshes la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mi mdza' ba shes pa la gnas pa'i rgyu dang bral ba dang / mtsho yongs su shes pa'i rgyu dang bral ba
108a6(mdo sde): ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i
108a7(mdo sde): lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na yul na gnas pa yid la byung ba dang / mdza' bshes dang phrad pa yid la byung ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa yid la byung ba dang / mtsho la gnas pa yid la byung ba
108a8(mdo sde): ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'chi ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'di
108b1(mdo sde): ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me dang mar me shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de
108b2(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me dang mar me'i bya ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba
108b3(mdo sde): shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mar me'i
108b4(mdo sde): bya ba nyams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur
108b5(mdo sde): ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bya ba shes pa 'gog pa'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba shes pa 'gog par
108b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo
108b7(mdo sde): chen po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun
108b8(mdo sde): 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na char chen po 'bab pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji
109a1(mdo sde): snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo chen po rnam par
109a2(mdo sde): skams pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag pa shes
109a3(mdo sde): pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chu bo chen po rnam par skams pa shes shing mkhas pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i zag
109a4(mdo sde): pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi
109a5(mdo sde): lam na rgyal srid thob pa'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa
109a6(mdo sde): shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rgyal srid thob pa'i srid pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes
109a7(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rgyal srid nyams pa
109a8(mdo sde): ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa'i zag pa shes pa
109b1(mdo sde): 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mo mun pa
109b2(mdo sde): mun nag gi nang na sbrul gdug pa'i za ma tog rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i
109b3(mdo sde): zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sbrul gdug pa'i za ma tog la dga' ba'i 'dun pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag
109b4(mdo sde): pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sbrul
109b5(mdo sde): gdug pa'i za ma tog chag pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta
109b6(mdo sde): ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus
109b7(mdo sde): long gi rmi lam na gzugs mthong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig
109b8(mdo sde): pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long gi rmi lam na chu'i sgra skad grag pa ji snyed ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung
110a1(mdo sde): ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long skom pa'i
110a2(mdo sde): rmi lam na btung ba rnam par skams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin
110a3(mdo sde): gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long gi rmi lam na mun pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
110a4(mdo sde): pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/
110a5(mdo sde): sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de
110a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de
110a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper
110a8(mdo sde): na/ dmus long gi rmi lam na nor chud gzan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de
110b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long gi rmi lam na snang ba thob pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas
110b2(mdo sde): zad pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
110b3(mdo sde): bu'i rmi lam na mi skye ba shes pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu
110b4(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na zad pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu
110b5(mdo sde): mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor ma rnyed pa'i rnyed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/
110b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar
110b7(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor rab tu nyams pa'i mi skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa
110b8(mdo sde): nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na shes pa thams
111a1(mdo sde): cad khong du chud pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas
111a2(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chos yongs su dris pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba
111a3(mdo sde): shes pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chos ji ltar bzung ba
111a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi rab tu 'jig pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs
111a5(mdo sde): pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'gog pa'i chos rjes su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
111a6(mdo sde): pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/
111a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam na brag ca'i sgra brnyan gyi spobs pa don rnam par rig par byed pa nyid kyi sgra ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming
111a8(mdo sde): tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam na brag ca'i don shes te/ don shes pa
111b1(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba shes/ don shes pa 'gog pa shes/ don shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes/ chos shes te chos shes pa kun 'byung ba shes/ chos shes pa 'gog pa shes/ chos shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes/
111b2(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig shes te/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa kun 'byung ba shes/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog pa shes/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes te/ spobs pa so
111b3(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/
111b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa
111b5(mdo sde): 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag dag nas snang ba dang / bral ba'i bar ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so
111b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar
111b7(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na snang ba dang bral ba'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed
111b8(mdo sde): pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kun brjod pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam
112a1(mdo sde): ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di
112a2(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa mngon par 'du byed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim
112a3(mdo sde): bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa shes pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas
112a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
112a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sprul pa thabs mkhas shing shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim
112a6(mdo sde): bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa shes pa dang / dga' ba la
112a7(mdo sde): gnas pa shes pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag
112a8(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pas gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang /
112b1(mdo sde): dga' ba la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang
112b2(mdo sde): ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na shes pa 'gog pa ji
112b3(mdo sde): snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs
112b4(mdo sde): pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa khong du chud pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
112b5(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'di ltar
112b6(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin
112b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen
112b8(mdo sde): te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nga rgyal gyi shes pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming
113a1(mdo sde): tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nga rgyal la
113a2(mdo sde): dbang byed pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de
113a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lam rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de
113a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'di ltar
113a5(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lus bskyod pa shes pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs
113a6(mdo sde): pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na bya ba la 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa
113a7(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam
113a8(mdo sde): na til mar gyi mar me bus pa zad cing zhi ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin
113b1(mdo sde): gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lus kyi las yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin
113b2(mdo sde): gshegs pas lus kyis las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste
113b3(mdo sde): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na brdzun du smra ba 'am/ brdzun du smra ba las ldog pa 'am/ phra ma'i ngag gam/ phra ma'i ngag las ldog pa 'am/ tshig rtsub po'i ngag gam/ tshig rtsub po'i ngag las ldog pa 'am/ tshig kyal pa 'am/ tshig
113b4(mdo sde): kyal pa las ldog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa
113b5(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshang ma bstan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes
113b6(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ngag gi las
113b7(mdo sde): 'gog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes
113b8(mdo sde): pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na zos pa dang / ma zos pa yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi
114a1(mdo sde): las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i
114a2(mdo sde): skyes bu'i rmi lam na bar snang la ri mo 'dri ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las
114a3(mdo sde): shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ri mo 'dri ba'i bzo shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ ming tsam gyi
114a4(mdo sde): bar du'o/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ri mo 'dri ba'i bskal pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam
114a5(mdo sde): ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper
114a6(mdo sde): na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen
114a7(mdo sde): to/ / bam po bcu gcig pa/ khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sngon du mgyogs pa ji snyed
114a8(mdo sde): pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes
114b1(mdo sde): pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na phyogs dag du don gyis bsam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid
114b2(mdo sde): kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sngon du mgyog pa shi ba ji snyed
114b3(mdo sde): pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog par
114b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na phyogs dag tu don grub pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog par
114b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam na rnam par sad pa
114b6(mdo sde): byed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa
114b7(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rnam par sad pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa
114b8(mdo sde): nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ma shi ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming
115a1(mdo sde): tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur
115a2(mdo sde): ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mi mthun pa'i rtsa ba yang dag par gcod pa ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o/ /khyim bdag de la
115a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dug 'thungs pa'i rtsi sman ma lus par byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas
115a4(mdo sde): yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i
115a5(mdo sde): skyes bu'i rmi lam na dug byin pa la dug bsal ba tshol ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim
115a6(mdo sde): bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dug yang mi 'byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
115a7(mdo sde): pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog pa shes par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu
115a8(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dug byin pa la yang dag pa'i gso ba'i dpyad byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes
115b1(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rtsi sman mkhan don la mkhas pa dang
115b2(mdo sde): nad kun nas ldang ba la mkhas pa dang / nad pa'i khams la mkhas pa dang / sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang / kha zas kyi cho ga la mkhas pa dang / khrus kyi cho ga la mkhas pa dang / sku mnye'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang / rkang pas mnye ba'i cho ga la mkhas
115b3(mdo sde): pa dang / lag pas mnye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang / nyal ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang / sad pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang / longs spyod kyi cho ga la mkhas pa dang / dpyad kyi sbyor ba 'jug pa la mkhas pa dang / dus shes/ tshod shes/ dus min
115b4(mdo sde): shes shing sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rtsi sman dag gis nad thams cad 'joms pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag
115b5(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sprul pa'i gso ba'i dpyad shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin
115b6(mdo sde): gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/
115b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa shes pa/ ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam
115b8(mdo sde): du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na gso ba'i dpyad ji snyed pa nyid
116a1(mdo sde): ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de lta bas na 'dir gang gi ye shes mthong ba thogs
116a2(mdo sde): pa med par 'jug pa gzhan gyis ma bstan cing / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pas sems can rnams la phan gdag pa'i don du bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni tsan dan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs
116a3(mdo sde): spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis lag gi bla tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang po bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang na bzhugs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lag gi bla gang pos khyim
116a4(mdo sde): bdag phywa mkhan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag byang phyogs logs na ko sa la zhes bya ba'i yul gyi ljongs yod de/ gangs ri'i rgyal po'i drung na mnyan yod ces bya ba grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed
116a5(mdo sde): kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de da ltar bzhugs so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis lag gi bla tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang po mnyan
116a6(mdo sde): yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nas ring khyad ci tsam smras pa/ khyim bdag de dpag tshad sum stong drug bcu rtsa bzhi yod do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis lag gi bla tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang po
116a7(mdo sde): ring ba de nas bcom ldan 'das de ji srid cig gis 'dir byon smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ring ba 'am nye ba med de/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhed na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir grangs med
116a8(mdo sde): pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las lhag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig dag tu gshegs so/ /khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dag mkhyen/ shin tu mkhyen/ shin tu gzigs/
116b1(mdo sde): shin tu thugs su chud/ shin tu mngon sum du mdzad de/ mig btsums pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dag rab tu mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhed na sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i blo nye
116b2(mdo sde): bar bzhag nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig dag tu gshegs so/ /gang po bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de zhal zas bzang po la nye bar spyan drangs na gshegs sam/ khyim bdag gal te cung zad yongs
116b3(mdo sde): su gtong ba lta na de bzhin gshegs pa de zhal zas gtsang ma la spyan drongs shig dang / khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par gshegs so/ /de nas khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyi
116b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po'i ltar mnyan nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dag blangs te/ tsan dan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi steng du 'dzegs nas me tog gis brgyan/ spos kyi byugs nas bcom ldan 'das de phyogs gang logs na bzhugs
116b5(mdo sde): pa der phyogs nas gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar dgongs te/ zhal zas bzang po de la de bzhin gshegs
116b6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gshegs par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs pa/ mi las 'das pa/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pas
116b7(mdo sde): khams kyi khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyi spyan drangs pa gsan nas gshegs par gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyi bcom ldan 'das mngon par spyan drangs te/ bran dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang /
116b8(mdo sde): nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed cag nyon cig ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par zhal
117a1(mdo sde): zas bzang po la spyan drangs kyis/ de la khyed nus pa ci yod pa dang / mthu ci yod pa'i lus kyis zhal ta bya ba la brtson pa dang ldan par gyis shig /khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis de skad ces smras pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams
117a2(mdo sde): dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis khyim bdag phywa mkhan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag smyos so/ /khyim bdag g.yengs so/ /gang bcom ldan 'das de ma mthong bar zhal zas bzang po la spyan 'dren tam/
117a3(mdo sde): khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis bcom ldan 'das de spyan 'dren to zhes su gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba
117a4(mdo sde): dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das de sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa dag brnyes te/ des na nga'i sems mkhyen nas gnang ngo / /de dag mgu zhing dga' la yi rangs pa dang rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas
117a5(mdo sde): de'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang / bca' ba bzang zhing rab tu mang po mngon par yang dag par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de phyem red kyi dus su nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyis khyams ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de'i
117a6(mdo sde): tshe smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig 'dus nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la
117a7(mdo sde): mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dge slong nye bar gnas shing 'khod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su 'dus nas nga la sbron cig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de ltar 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ mnyan yod kyi
117a8(mdo sde): grong khyer chen po na dge slong nye bar gnas shing 'khod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong
117b1(mdo sde): khyer chen po na dge slong nye bar gnas shing mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su 'dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la dbab lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs nas gdan bcas pa de la
117b2(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' bstsal pa/ dge slong grong khyer chen po dge ba'i pha rol 'gro na khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la sogs pa mngon par spyan drangs te/ de
117b3(mdo sde): ngas gnang gis de'i phyir dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag gis tshul shing long shig / de'i tshe na der dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gang dag gis tshul shing blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/
117b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i lam las 'dong bar gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das
117b5(mdo sde): kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das nas nang par sngar smad g.yogs dang / chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ grong khyer chen po dge
117b6(mdo sde): ba'i pha rol 'gro ga la ba der gshegs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shing shun can rgyal po'i khab na drang srong gi ri ngos la sba dang / shing pib pa la skye ba na 'dug la/ nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
117b7(mdo sde): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dag bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson zhing / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pa 'chag cing 'gro ba des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu nam mkha'i lam nas gshegs
117b8(mdo sde): pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa
118a1(mdo sde): shing shun can la bka' stsal pa/ shing shun can tshur shog /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shing shun can bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal par rig nas/ lus dang srog la ma bltas par ngam grog dang g.yang sa de la bdag nyid mchongs so/ /
118a2(mdo sde): de bar snang la song ma thag tu mngon par shes pa drug mngon sum du byas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / shing shun can dang / dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tshang bar thabs gcig tu grong khyer chen po dge ba'i pha rol 'gro ga la ba der gshegs
118a3(mdo sde): so/ /de nas dge slong de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis tsan dan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang der mngon par zhugs te/ la la ni seng ge'i gzugs/ la la ni stag gi gzugs/ la la ni glang po che'i gzugs/ la la ni
118a4(mdo sde): rta'i gzugs/ la la ni khyu mchog gi gzugs/ la la ni klu'i gzugs/ la la ni nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs/ la la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs/ la la ni blon po'i gzugs/ la la ni dge slong rang gi gzugs/
118a5(mdo sde): la la ni lus las 'od sngon po dag rab tu 'byin/ la la ni dmar po dang / la la ni dkar po dang / la la ni lus las 'od btsod kha dag rab tu 'byin/ la la ni char 'bebs/ la la ni rlung rab tu gtong / la la ni nor gyi char rab tu 'bebs/ la la ni
118a6(mdo sde): gser gyi char rab tu 'bebs/ la la ni dngul gyi char rab tu 'bebs/ la la ni spos chu'i char rab tu 'bebs/ la la ni ser bu bsil ba rab tu gtong / la la ni phrag pa sa la khyer/ la la ni rgya mtsho chen por chu 'bebs pa khyer/ la la ni shing
118a7(mdo sde): rta la zhon/ la la ni glang po che'i shing rta la zhon/ la la ni rta'i shing rta la zhon/ la las ni klu'i shing rta mngon par sprul/ la las ni grul bum gyi shing rta mngon par sprul/ la las ni gnod sbyin gyi shing rta mngon par sprul/ la las ni dri za'i shing rta
118a8(mdo sde): mngon par sprul/ la las ni cho 'phrul dag zung du sprul/ la las ni bdag lus las me 'bar/ la las ni bdag gi lus las chu 'dzag ste/ de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang tsan dan
118b1(mdo sde): gyi khyams dang / khang bzangs su mngon par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bdag nyid kyi dngos po bzung bas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ni yang dag par brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus ni rnam par spras/ mdzes shing
118b2(mdo sde): dang ba dang / dbang po ni zhi/ thugs ni zhi/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas dam pa ni brnyes/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu ni phyin/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
118b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu stong dag gis ni phyag byas/ bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun rab tu 'bebs shing mchod pa dang / me tog man dA ra ba'i char 'bebs shing / tsan dan gyi khyams dang khang bzangs su mngon par gshegs te/ de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das nyan
118b4(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sems can dag yang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing tsan dan gyi khyams dang khang bzangs su mngon par gshegs so/ /dge ba'i pha rol 'gro'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
118b5(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bar snang las gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po chen po lta bur mthong nas/ srog chags khri dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go/ /
118b6(mdo sde): gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la spyad pa'i srog chags khri dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mthong nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag tu mi
118b7(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po/ /sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags khri dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /nyan thos dag gis 'dul ba'i srog chags brgyad khri dag ni nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas chos rnams la
118b8(mdo sde): chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go/ /lha'i bu khri dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go/ /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i
119a1(mdo sde): bu khri dag gis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag pa nas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar du gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la
119a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ gtsug phud lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti gyis shig /dri za'i rgyal po'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas de ltar 'tshal zhes lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan te/ dri za sa ya phrag drug dag dang lhan cig tu rgyud kyi dbyangs dang /
119a3(mdo sde): glu'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskur sti byed do/ /rol mo'i sgra dang glu sgra de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po'i klu'i rgyal po de dag rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi gnas nas byung ngo / /de dag byung bas
119a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po na 'byung po chen po dag gi gnas rnam par 'khrugs so/ /klu'i rgyal po mdzes pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag brgyad dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po
119a5(mdo sde): lha mdzes la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la stsogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i
119a6(mdo sde): phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po ud pa la mig la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag
119a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te thams cad la yang bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po nye dga' la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i
119a8(mdo sde): rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i rA ba Na la stsogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po tshib pa'i bu la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po mig nag
119b1(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po gau ta ma la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po kam pa la la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu
119b2(mdo sde): dang / klu'i rgyal po mgrin sngon la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgros la stsogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi
119b3(mdo sde): can la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po rdul bral la stsogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ klu'i rgyal po 'od chen la sogs
119b4(mdo sde): pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zla chen la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / rlung yang dag par ston pa
119b5(mdo sde): la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po shugs 'dzin la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdul dka' la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad
119b6(mdo sde): me long zhes bya ba klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po char chen spyod la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag /bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ /de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya
119b7(mdo sde): stong dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang / 'khor dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ /de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po dkrugs so/ /dge slong de dag gis kyang grong khyer dang / grong rdal
119b8(mdo sde): dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri 'or sa dang / bcas pa dkrugs so/ /de nas sa rnam pa du mar g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ /
120a1(mdo sde): de nas khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bzang zhing rab tu mang po rang gi lag gis yang dag par tshim par byas shing yang dag par brims so/ /de nas bcom ldan
120a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag su'i bsod snyoms kyang yongs su bza' bar mi bya ste/ grong khyer chen po dge ba'i pha rol 'gro ba 'di klu dkrugs pa dag gis grong khyer ma rung bar byas sa re/ de nas bcom ldan
120a3(mdo sde): 'das bsod snyoms bzhes nas nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun phyir bkye nas gnas su sprul pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med
120a4(mdo sde): pa dag mngon par sprul to/ /der klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon par sprul to/ /klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom ldan 'das la ma dad cing blta bar mi 'dod pa de dag
120a5(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mngon par sprul to/ /der klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po/ /klu bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu
120a6(mdo sde): med pa dag ni sangs rgyas la dad pa bskyes so/ /de dag dad pa thob ma thag tu klu'i skye gnas de nas shi ste/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa de dag btul nas
120a7(mdo sde): bsod snyoms bzhes te bar snang la gshegs so/ /de'i tshe na yul lag mthil ltar mnyam pa na dka' thub can mes byin zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i bar snang las gshegs pa mthong ngo / /de mthong nas
120a8(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu gus pa bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la mtshan ma'i rnam pa de bzhin du mdzad du gsol/ gang bdag gi gnas 'dir bzhugs na mchod
120b1(mdo sde): par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can mes byin gyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ skye bo phyi ma dag nyid la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rdo leb la zhabs bzhag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can mes byin la 'di skad
120b2(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze khyod kyi sems dad par bya ba'i don tu 'di ni mchod rten no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu tshur shog /ma dros pa'i mtsho ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /
120b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas kyi chu 'gram du bzhugs so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa bcom ldan 'das
120b4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gshegs par rig nas/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug gi snying po dang / rdo'i snying po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i stan lnga brgya tsam zhig mngon par sprul to/ /
120b5(mdo sde): khri stan lnga brgya de dag gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdan bshams te/ klu'i ras bcos bus g.yogs so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi
120b6(mdo sde): drung du song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po zan zos shing lhung bzed dang lag pa bkrus par thugs su chud nas bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu song la gnas brtan shA ri'i bu khyod la ston pa 'bod do
120b7(mdo sde): zhes smros shig / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang
120b8(mdo sde): ba bskum pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ma dros pa'i mtsho nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun na 'dug go/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snam sbyar 'grub par gyur to/ /de nas
121a1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig tu yang dag par dga' ba'i gtam dang gtam snyan pa rnam pa mang po byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ston pa ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod
121a2(mdo sde): la 'bod de/ ston pa khyod la mngon par dgyes kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshur shog /ston pa khyod la gsung gis 'dong ngo / /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
121a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po re shig snam sbyar 'di 'tshem mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sor mo lnga khab lngar mngon par sprul nas snam sbyar de btsems so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa
121a4(mdo sde): maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 'di ci byed smras pa/ snam sbyar btsem par bya ba 'di myur du btsem par bya'o/ /smras pa/ drub pa dang / zin pa nyid du gyis shig /de ma thag tu drub cing zin pa
121a5(mdo sde): nyid du byas nas/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshur shog da 'dong / smras pa/ mi 'gro/ smras pa/ gal te khyed mi 'gro na stobs kyis bkur ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu re shig ska rags 'di stobs kyis khyer nus dang nga
121a6(mdo sde): stobs kyis khyer bar shes so/ /des ska rags de 'jig rten gyi khams bdun du byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ska rags de rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bteg pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
121a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos kyang ska rags de gdeg par ma nus so/ /de nas ma dros pa'i mtsho rlabs shin tu g.yos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig
121a8(mdo sde): rten du dog sa chen po g.yos pa byung ba 'di rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rta thul la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nyan thos chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /de nas tshe
121b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu je bzhud cig /bdag kyang mchi'o/ /de skad smras nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs
121b2(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni phyi nas 'ong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mngon du phyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pas de dang por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas
121b3(mdo sde): 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan ma de lta bu byung ba mdzad pa'i mtshan ma ji lta bu byung ba mdzad pas rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan
121b4(mdo sde): 'das la klu'i rgyal po mdzes dgas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ mdzes dga' ngas zhu ba lung
121b5(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir 'di ltar thams cad skabs dbye bar bya'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa ston pa bde byin mdzad la zhu ba ni/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis dang / /bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg pa/ /bde gshegs sbyin mdzad de ni lung
121b6(mdo sde): bstan gsol/ /ma dros klu yi 'jig rten mgon de la/ /zhus pa bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan pa/ /dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bus yid zhi zhing / /gang gi bde bas bde bar gshegs pa bskyed/ /sngon gyi srid par spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /
121b7(mdo sde): skye bo thams cad bde bas bde ldan byas/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur/ /ston pa'i gsung gis mdzes pa de dga' nas/ /de yi skad cig sa steng pus btsugs te/ /gzhal med
121b8(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems ni dang bas su/ /'jig rten sgron ma 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed/ /ston pa'i blo yis mkhas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba kun las nges 'byung phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs med blo dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
122a1(mdo sde): bde gshegs gzhan min gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhus pa/ 'od mdzad spyan sdug legs pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /blo dge nyon
122a2(mdo sde): mongs tshogs las rnam grol zhing / /ye shes dri med spyod yul khyod la ni/ /spyad pa spyod tshe rnam thar bla med zhu/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du/ /ji ltar spyad na byang chub zhi 'tshal zhing / /mi mchog dam pa bdag
122a3(mdo sde): gi spyod sbyong ba/ /yid 'das de dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba de yis rdul bcom dbang po bsdams/ /'dod pa'i 'ching las thugs ni rnam grol ba'i/ /dgongs pa'i de nyid sems kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /thugs zhi ma
122a4(mdo sde): dkrugs des ni lung bstan pa/ /mkhas pas dge ba'i dag ni spyad pa'i phyir/ /srog gi phyir yang yid ni mi ldog cing / /rtag tu spyod tshe nyon mongs med yid kyis/ /lus dang ngag gi dge ba mnyam spyod pa/ /de yis legs pa'i las
122a5(mdo sde): de byas pas na/ /'khor ba'i 'gro la spyod pa rnam dag ste/ /chu yi nang nas pad ma skye ba ltar/ /gos pa med cing byang chub yang dag 'grub/ /bde gshegs gsung gis lha yi mdzes pa klu/ /de ni dga' zhing legs par mgu bas su/ /
122a6(mdo sde): de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed/ /thub pa 'jig rten gsum la sman mdzad pa/ /blo gros nges par zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyad pa spyod tshe khyod kyi rjes slob cing / /
122a7(mdo sde): byang chub mi g.yo yid ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can don du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /lus dang srog ni de bzhin btang nas su/ /sdug bsngal thar byed sangs rgyas 'gyur ba dang / /byang chub zhi ba bla med thob par bgyi/ /klu de'i
122a8(mdo sde): bsam pa thugs su chud nas su/ /rgyal ba dgra las rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad de/ /de tshe ji ltar gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas zhing ni 'od kyis khyab/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa bstan pa la/ /nam mkha'i
122b1(mdo sde): lhas rig legs so zhes gsol te/ /e ma'o rgyal bas rdul bcom dbang po bsgoms/ /khyod dang mnyam med gong na yod ma yin/ /sangs rgyas zhing mang dag ni rab g.yos shing / /'dod pa'i lha ni sder bcas shin tu rmongs/ /lha tshogs
122b2(mdo sde): mang po bsam pa rab dga' zhing / /rgyal ba dbang po thub la phyag 'tshal byed/ /ston pa'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog /maud gal rus kyis rgyal la yongs zhus pa/ /gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'dzum mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan bde
122b3(mdo sde): gshegs rgyu gang rkyen gang lags/ /maud gal bu yis rgyal la nyer zhus pa/ /the tsom gcod mdzad rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /nga la mchod pa byed pa'i klu 'di ni/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ji snyed zhing 'di 'od
122b4(mdo sde): kyis khyab pa dag / de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing gcig 'gyur/ /des na rgyal ba 'di ltar 'gyur ba ste/ /'dren pa de'i ming dbang po rgyal mtshan no/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas dag /des ni 'gro srid pha rol
122b5(mdo sde): sgrol byed de/ /'di la brten nas ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ /maud gal bu khyod de ltar shes par gyis/ /klu de lung bstan pa ni thos nas su/ /bla na med pa dag gi dga' bas khyab/ /lung bstan thos nas bar snang 'di las ni/ /ta
122b6(mdo sde): la brgyad bcu srid du mngon par 'phags/ /phyogs bcu dag na rnam dag rgyal ba'i zhing / /bzang la grangs med sangs rgyas de mthong ste/ /mthong nas sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag la/ /tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis
122b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba bstod/ /'gro ba phan skyed rgyal ba dgra las rgyal/ /dbang po thul cing ma nor de bzhin gsung / /'od mdzad bden gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs tshig rmongs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i
122b8(mdo sde): rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'jigs sel sngags grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas/ /'jigs las grol dang 'gro
123a1(mdo sde): ba thar bgyid pa/ /'jig rten lam zhugs bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /ji ltar 'dren pa bdag nyid 'jigs grol zhing / /skye bo 'jigs las rab tu grol mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis legs par gsungs pa'i bka' thos nas/ /
123a2(mdo sde): de bzhin ngoms med yid kyis spyad par bgyi/ /chu chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgya mtsho des/ /'gro la phan phyir ston la zhu byed pa/ /'jigs bcas zhe sar bcas shing de brten nas/ /mi dbang spyan sngar zhe sa bcas pas 'dug /de yi bsam pa 'dren
123a3(mdo sde): pas thugs chud nas/ /ji ltar spyad na 'jigs dang rnam bral zhing / /sems can dag kyang 'jigs las thar byed pa/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gsung gis lung bstan to/ /byang chub spyad pa rjes su spyod bya zhing / /dbyug mtshon med pas
123a4(mdo sde): 'gro la rab tu ston/ /chu dang thang dang de bzhin g.yul 'thab pa'i/ /'jigs la yang dang yang du 'jigs med sbyin/ /de yis legs pa'i las ni byas pas na/ /'jigs par mi 'gro byang chub reg 'gyur la/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i
123a5(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems kyis su/ /shin tu mi bzad bdud stobs rab skrag byed/ /stobs bcu'i mkhyen pas rgya mtsho de dga' nas/ /de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te/ /'jigs par mi gnas zhi bar rab 'dug nas/ /bde bar
123a6(mdo sde): gshegs la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal byed/ /srid kun bdag la mi gnas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngang med 'jigs bral ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngang dang 'jigs las skye bo bsgral bgyi zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa mi dngang bdag 'gyur
123a7(mdo sde): bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ drang srong chen po spyan dge dbang po thul/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho rgal cing pha rol phyin/ /skam la bzhugs pa sred bskam
123a8(mdo sde): gang zag mchog / 'gro ba'i don phyir khyod zhu bka' stsal gsol/ /ji ltar spyad na bde gshegs bdag skye zhing / /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu gnas gyur dang / /bdud phrag stong dag gis kyang mi bskyod pa/ /kun spyad 'di dag bdag la bka'
123b1(mdo sde): stsal gsol/ /sangs rgyas tshul la mi g.yo rab gnas shing / /klu yi gtso bos 'dren la de zhus pa/ /klu yi bdag po bsam pa thugs chud nas/ /nyon mongs kun spangs de ni lung bstan pa/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas chos kyi nges
123b2(mdo sde): ldan zhing / /nges pa stong pa'i yul la rab tu gnas/ /srid las rnam rgyal bstan la mi g.yo zhing / /gzhal med byang chub la ni 'dun pa bskyed/ /gser gtsug rdzu 'phrul che ba'i klu de ni/ /sangs rgyas gsung pa thos nas the tsom med/ /
123b3(mdo sde): byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid bskyed cing / /'jigs kun pha rol phyin la mngon par bstod/ /srid mtsho rgal cing skam la shin tu bzhugs/ /the tsom mi mnga' mi g.yo brtan brnyes shing / /srid par 'khor brtan bzhin du rab bzhugs
123b4(mdo sde): pa/ /ri rab ri la lha yi gnas bcas bzhin/ /'di ltar mi g.yo ba la skyabs mchi zhing / /mi g.yo ri lta bur ni 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de'i tshe 'gul dang mi 'gul zhing mi gnas/ /mi g.yo ri rab lta bur 'gyur bar bgyi/ /ma smad pas
123b5(mdo sde): ni de yi thugs chud nas/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis lung bstan pa/ /bskal pa stong phrag brgyad bcur spyad byas nas/ /ma 'ongs pa yis dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bde ba'i lam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur ba ste/ /mtshan ni
123b6(mdo sde): legs mthong zhes bya shin tu sdug / srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing / /bsil ba bde ba zhi ba'i lam 'god 'gyur/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa klu des thos nas su/ /gzhal med dga' ba'i sems ni rab dang bas/ /nyon
123b7(mdo sde): mongs thams cad sel cing ma smad pa/ /'gro ba'i 'dren pa la ni phyag 'tshal byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ud pa la mig gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mi mchog 'dul mdzad gzi
123b8(mdo sde): brjid mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rab zhi zhing nyer zhi pha rol gshegs/ /zhi gnas yon tan rab zhi rnam grol ba/ /zhi ba mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa gsung / /khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /zhi gnas dga' zhing zhi
124a1(mdo sde): gnas bsten pa dang / /zhi gnas la ni ji ltar mkhas par 'gyur/ /kun gzigs myur du bdag gi som nyi khum/ /rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang / /rgyal bas ud pal mig la lung bstan pa/ /gang gis dge ba'i las kyi
124a2(mdo sde): yid 'ong ba'i/ /zhi gnas la ni shin tu bslabs par 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sems g.yor mi byed cing / /bskal pa bye bar zhi gnas bsten byas pa/ /byang chub dam pa dpa' mchog
124a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de yid rab zhi byang chub rtogs nas su/ /rnam 'dren 'gro ba zhi la sbyor byed cing / /rab tu sems zhi g.yo bar mi 'gyur la/ /sems can nyon mongs mi g.yo zhi bar byed/ /des pa ud pal mig gi klu des ni/ /
124a4(mdo sde): rgyal bas legs par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas/ /nyon mongs kun g.yo yid ni zhi gyur te/ /byang chub mchog rab sems ni bskyed gyur to/ /de yi zhi gnas sems la brten nas su/ /byang chub sems bskyed rgyal ba de la bstod/ /
124a5(mdo sde): khyod la bskyed nas zhi gnas rtogs gyur cing / /shin tu yid zhi sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa zhi gnas
124a6(mdo sde): thugs su chud/ /rgyal ba gang zag mchog la bdag zhu ba/ /khyod nyid las 'khrungs byang chub rab gnas pa/ /mi mchog ji ltar lhag mthong dag la spyad/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la dga' bos zhus/ /klu de'i sngon gyi mtha' ni
124a7(mdo sde): gzigs pas na/ /dge ba'i las bsags pa dag thugs chud nas/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba 'di skad gsung / /ye shes dam pa byang chub mchog btsal phyir/ /ma zhum yid kyis nor dang 'bru dag la/ /ser sna med cing
124a8(mdo sde): rdzas mang mi nyung dang / /chung ma dang ni bdag nyid gtong bar byed/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pa dang / /gtong ba shin tu sdug bsngal bsten pas na/ /ye shes dam pa bdag rgyal sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de ni lhag mthong spyad
124b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po nye dgas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'gro ba kun gyi 'dren la bdag zhu ba/ /khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mnyam
124b2(mdo sde): par spyod pa dang / /zang zing med zhi byang chub 'thob 'gyur lags/ /'dren pa de la klu des zhus pa dang / /zhi gnas lhag mthong yang dag len mkhyen pa/ /thogs pa med pa 'dren pa 'di brnyes pas/ /de ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la
124b3(mdo sde): bzhag / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig spyad spyod tshe/ /gnyis ka'i stobs 'di mnyam par bsten pas na/ /de ni bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing / /'gro ba'i don du mnyam par rnam par sbyong / /bskal pa bye ba mang po de 'tshang rgya/ /zhing
124b4(mdo sde): gi dam pa dag kyang 'god 'gyur te/ /de'i mtha' bsngags pa bskal pa bye mang du/ /sangs rgyas bye bas zad par de mi spyod/ /de tshe klu yi bdag po nye dga' yis/ /theg pa mnyam pa'i bsngags pa thos nas su/ /gzhal du med pa'i
124b5(mdo sde): dga' bas sems bde nas/ /byang chub mchog gi sems rab bskyed gyur to/ /'jig rten phan phyir byang chub de lung bstan/ /ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /ming ni rgyal ba 'dren pa kun spyan no/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag
124b6(mdo sde): thar bar byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ bde gshegs khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /'gro ba'i don du phan pa tshol byed cing / /byang chub bla ma tshol la
124b7(mdo sde): mi skyo ba/ /rkang gnyis dam pa mchog gis de lung ston/ /mi yi khyu mchog la ni klus zhus pa/ /klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud de/ /thub pa sngon mtha' sbyor la mi 'jigs pas/ /klu yi bdag po'i the tshom lung bstan pa/ /
124b8(mdo sde): byang chub zhi ba spyad pa spyod 'dod pa/ /des shing nyams pa med par spyod pa dang / /bdag dang gzhan dag la yang mi gnod cing / /ser sna med cing gtong ldan rgyal ba yin/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /'gro ba gang gi 'khor
125a1(mdo sde): bar bde 'dod la/ /des shing thams cad du ni snying rjer ldan/ /nor byin pas ni sdud pa byed par 'gyur/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /nam du'ang skye ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde bas skye bo bder 'god la/ /
125a2(mdo sde): kha na ma tho med cing gnas zhir 'jog /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de bskul bas na/ /mchog tu dga' bas sems ni bder 'gyur te/ /de yis skad cig sa la pus btsugs nas/ /tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis rgyal bstod pa/ /gau tam
125a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun na mnyam med de/ /'gro ba zil mnan bde gshegs lhang nge ba/ /khyod kyi zhal du lhar bcas 'gro kun bal/ /'di ltar thal mo sbyar nas skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub mchog gi yid ni bskyed bgyi zhing / /'di ltar bde gshegs
125a4(mdo sde): khyod kyi ye shes dang / /ston pa khyod kyis the tshom bsal ba ltar/ /bdag kyang thos nas 'jig rten the tshom bsal/ /de nas de'i ston gzhal med byang chub phyir/ /yid ni shin tu dgyes nas bka' stsal pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dren par
125a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yi/ /mi mchog ming ni dbang po chen po'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po e ra pa nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyi zhu ba zhus pa/ 'jig rten dpag med mang po'i skyabs kyi mchog /rgyal ba the tshom gcod la
125a6(mdo sde): zhu bgyi ba/ /byang chub sems dpas sug las ci bgyis na/ /sangs rgyas mngon du lhan cig phrad pa 'thob/ /'jig rten mgon po de la klus zhus nas/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pas lung bstan pa/ /sems can rgyud la nyon mongs
125a7(mdo sde): rnam rig dang / /yongs su dul ba'i yid ni rnam shes nas/ /'gro la phan phyir snying rje bskyed nas su/ /byang chub mchog gis don du spyad pa spyod/ /bdag dang rgyal bar ji ltar phrad snyam nas/ /thabs la mkhas par mngon par rab
125a8(mdo sde): gnas te/ /rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs mya ngan 'das/ /sku gdung dag la gzhal med mchod byed cing / /rnam grol yid kyis smon lam 'debs par byed/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /rtag tu sangs
125b1(mdo sde): rgyas mngon par phrad 'thob ste/ /rgyal ba mngon sum mchod pa byas nas su/ /byang chub dga' ba 'od ldan reg par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs tshig thos nas/ /e ra pa na klu ni yid mgu ste/ /gzhal du med pa'i
125b2(mdo sde): dga' bas sems bde nas/ /dad pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas mngon bstod pa/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis bdag gi som nyi the tshom bsal/ /byang chub don du yid 'di bskyed bgyi ste/ /sdug bsngal mthar
125b3(mdo sde): bgyid sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /gang zag bdag gis klu yi bdag po yi/ /bsam pa thugs chud byang chub lung bstan pa/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi ru/ /spyod pa spyad nas de nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mi mchog mtshan
125b4(mdo sde): ni thams cad sgrol ba ste/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar bar byed/ /de yi ring bsrel mang por 'gyur ba ste/ /skye bo mang po mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /klu de ston pa'i gsung gis dga' gyur nas/ /'jig rten phan mdzad rnam
125b5(mdo sde): 'dren mngon bstod pa/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don ni rgya cher mdzad/ /sdug bsngal mthar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/ / bam po bcu gnyis pa/ de nas klu'i rgyal po tshib pa'i bus bcom ldan
125b6(mdo sde): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten don slad du/ /'jig rten don mdzad rnam 'dren la zhu ba/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas/ /ma rtogs rtogs nas rgyal ba rnam
125b7(mdo sde): 'dren 'gyur/ /tshib pa'i bu des rgyal la mngon zhus nas/ /nyon mongs thams cad bsal bas lung bstan pa/ /dge ba'i las kyis 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing / /nyon mongs bcom pas des na rgyal zhes bya/ /de ni 'gro kun tshe
125b8(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas la/ /mchog tu dang ba dag gis sems kyang shes/ /de yis las kyi lam de byas pas na/ /'gro ba'i rtag pa rgyal ba dag tu 'gyur/ /de yis rgyal ba'i bshad pa thos nas su/ /'gro ba thams cad la ni dad
126a1(mdo sde): par byas/ /de tshe de yis dge ba byas pas na/ /'di yi smon lam btab ltar bdag 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon pos de lung bstan/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas su ni 'gyur ba ste/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar
126a2(mdo sde): byed cing / /spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal ba mngon par bstod/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad bskyed mngon bstod pa/ /'gro ba thar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam yas bde gshegs khyod
126a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ drang srong chen po skyabs mchog dpag tu med/ /skyon dang bral zhing yon tan mchog brnyes pa/ /
126a4(mdo sde): stobs bcu'i 'jigs pas rnam gnon khyod la ni/ /byang chub zhi spyod mkhas pa rab gnas zhu/ /des pa'i nyon mongs ji ltar bsal ba dang / /rgyal ba'i mchog nyid ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ /bdud kyi spyod yul de dag ji
126a5(mdo sde): ltar spang / /sangs rgyas spyod yul dag la ji ltar spyad/ /rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang / /ji ltar bde gshegs spyod yul spyad pa dang / /ji ltar bdud kyi spyod yul spang ba dag /lam gnyis shin tu mkhyen pas rab tu
126a6(mdo sde): bstan/ /ston pa la ni klu bdag des zhus nas/ /de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa/ /mi mkhas gang dag sems can 'du shes spyod/ /de dag nag po'i rtsa lag spyod yul spyod/ /gang dag sems can med cing yid mi
126a7(mdo sde): gnas/ /de dag thams cad gzigs pa'i spyod yul spyod/ /nag po'i rtsa lag dag las rgyal nas su/ /byang chub bla med zhi ba des thob po/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /bdud kyi spyod yul myur bar rnam spangs
126a8(mdo sde): te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs ltar spyod yul dag /bsten pas de ni myur du rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gau ta mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ kha lo sgyur mchog
126b1(mdo sde): khyod la zhu bgyi ba/ /'dren pa khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis nas/ /klu yi skye gnas dag ni gcod bgyid cing / /sangs rgyas tshul gyi myu gu bskyed par bgyid/ /bde bar gshegs la klu des zhus pa dang / /de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan
126b2(mdo sde): pa/ /sems can med la rgyal ba'i sras spyod cing / /byang chub sems la nams kyang de mi gnas/ /de ni stong nyid khong du chud pa yin/ /mkhas pa mtshan ma smon lam rnam spangs shing / /'dzangs pa mi dmigs pa la gnas pa dag /'di ni
126b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos mngon myu gu bskyed/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /mi dmigs pa la brten par rab gnas shing / /bdud kyi zhags bcings dam pa bcad nas su/ /sangs rgyas tshul la klu ni rab tu gnas/ /'jig rten
126b4(mdo sde): mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /rnam thar rgyal zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing / /bdud kyi dbang song srog chags thar bar byed/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /
126b5(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed/ /khyod kyi lam bstan pas na sangs rgyas bsten/ /mi mchog thar mdzad zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po kam pa la'i sgras bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i
